VoiceDir15.BAE4: Knowingly, but hiding the truth of their encounter with Mephisto from Taissa.
Line15.BAE4: Yes. Hopefully for the last time.
Line13.789BF: Yours was even longer, it seems. Did you face your inner demons as the Horadrim did?
Line11.789BF: I don’t know yet. He wandered around for hours until the tea wore off. A long journey through the swamp is more rewarding than a short one.
